en.banner_describe: The block storage service provides a persistent cloud hard disk for the cloud host. Cloud hard disk using multiple copies, real-time replication technology to ensure that your data is safe and reliable.
en.banner_describe_mobile: Cloud hard disk using multiple copies, real-time replication technology to ensure that your data is safe and reliable
en.description_brief_five: Based on enterprise-class SSD disk and 10 Gigabit Ethernet distributed cloud storage, to prevent I / O bottlenecks, to ensure continuous high-performance fast storage services.
en.description_brief_four: Mounted to the cloud host on the hard disk can be online at any time expansion, without the need for line operation to ensure that the system 24 × 7 run.
en.description_brief_one: Stable system storage I / O, providing up to 6000IOPS and 170MB / s bandwidth to ensure smooth running of your application software.
en.description_brief_seven: To meet the needs of large storage business users, with the cloud to support capacity-based cloud hard drive: capacity of 5TB, the price is cheaper, the performance is still 500IOPS, throughput 48MB / s.
en.description_brief_six: The shared disk provided by TongFang cloud storage service allows a single volume to be mounted on multiple virtual machines at the same time, allowing the user to construct highly available distributed applications on a shared disk.
en.description_brief_three: The advanced Burst function allows the user to break through the QoS limit in a short time to meet the requirements of the instantaneous IO storm in the business scenario.
en.description_brief_two: Second-level operation of the second-class billing, according to the cloud disk you need performance and the actual use of time to pay the cost of a substantial savings in your TCO total cost of ownership.
en.description_title_seven: Low cost, high capacity hard drive
en.feature_brief_four: With a larger single hard disk capacity, up to 5TB, for higher capacity requirements of the application.
en.feature_brief_one: TongFang cloud supporting flexible expansion and providing pay-per-view billing.
en.feature_brief_three: Meet the vast majority of business IO scene. Provide long-term, stable performance output over all service hours.
en.feature_brief_two: TongFang cloud hard disk can be flexibly transferred to other projects, the rapid realization of resource sharing.
en.introduction_intro: TongFang cloud block storage service provides a persistent cloud hard disk for the cloud host. Cloud hard disk using multiple copies, real-time replication technology to ensure that your data is safe and reliable. Distributed storage will save your data on multiple servers, even if the server fails, it does not affect the reliability and availability of data, so you sit back and relax.
en.title: TongFang cloud - Storage

zh.banner_describe: 块存储服务为云主机提供持久化的云硬盘。云硬盘使用多重副本、实时复制的技术以保证您的数据安全、可靠。
zh.banner_describe_mobile: 云硬盘使用多重副本、实时复制的技术以保证您的数据安全、可靠
zh.description_brief_five: 基于企业级SSD磁盘及万兆以太网的分布式云存储，预防I／O瓶颈，保证持续的高性能快存储服务。
zh.description_brief_four: 挂载到云主机上的硬盘可以随时进行在线秒级扩容，无需进行线下操作，保证系统24×7运行。
zh.description_brief_one: 性能稳定的系统存储I/O，提供高达 6000IOPS 及 170MB/s 带宽，保证您的应用软件流畅运行。
zh.description_brief_seven: 满足用户大存储业务需求，同方云支持容量型云硬盘：容量达 5TB、价格更便宜、性能依然有 500IOPS、吞吐量 48MB/s。
zh.description_brief_six: 同方云快存储服务提供的共享盘允许单个卷同时挂载到多个虚拟机上，使得用户可以在共享盘上构造高可用的分布式应用。
zh.description_brief_three: 同方云云硬盘先进的Burst功能允许用户短时间内突破QoS的限制，满足业务场景中瞬时IO风暴的要求。
zh.description_brief_two: 秒级操作秒级计费，按照您需要的云磁盘性能及实际使用时间进行费用支付，大量节省您的TCO总体拥有成本。
zh.feature_brief_four: 拥有更大的单块硬盘容积，最高可达5TB，适用于对容量要求较高的应用，例如文档存储等离线业务。
zh.feature_brief_one: 云硬盘整合了计算、存储与网络资源IT基础设施能力租用服务，支持弹性扩容，并提供按需付费的结算功能。
zh.feature_brief_three: 高性能云硬盘可满足绝大多数业务的IO场景。在全部服务时间内，提供长期、稳定的性能输出。
zh.feature_brief_two: 同方云云硬盘可灵活转让给其他项目，快速实现资源共享。
zh.introduction_intro: 同方云块存储服务为云主机提供持久化的云硬盘。云硬盘使用多重副本、实时复制的技术以保证您的数据安全、可靠。分布式存储将您的数据保存在多台服务器上，即使有服务器发生故障，也不影响数据的可靠性和可用性，让您高枕无忧。
zh.title: 同方云 - 存储
